videoSnippet.title: The Bluff! | Vallejo Pons vs Anand || Grenke Chess Classic (2019)
videoSnippet.description:
Interview with Anand here https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vedAfkRmO2c

Round 4 Impressions here https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4pbi1v0i8uk

Follow me on Instagram for extra content https://www.instagram.com/agadmator/

Francisco Vallejo Pons vs Viswanathan Anand
GRENKE Chess Classic (2019), Karlsruhe GER, rd 4, Apr-23 
Caro-Kann Defense: Two Knights Attack. Mindeno Variation Exchange Line (B11)

1. e4 c6 2. Nc3 d5 3. Nf3 Bg4 4. h3 Bf3 5. Qf3 e6 6. g3 Nf6 7. a3 Bc5 8. d3 O-O 9. Bg2 Nbd7 10. O-O b5 11. Qd1 Qb6 12. Qe2 a5 13. Kh1 d4 14. Nb1 e5 15. Nd2 Bd6 16. f4 Qc7 17. f5 Nb6 18. g4 c5 19. Nf3 c4 20. Bg5 Nfd7 21. f6 g6 22. Bh6 Rfc8 23. Ng5 Bf8 24. Bf8 Nf8 25. Qe1 Nbd7 26. a4 ba4 27. Ra4 cd3 28. cd3 h6 29. Nf3 Ne6 30. Qh4 Kh7 31. g5 h5 32. Raa1 Qc2 33. Rf2 Qd3 34. Bf1 Qb3 35. Nd2 Qb4 36. Be2 Qd2 37. Bh5 Qg5 38. Bg6 Kg6 39. Rg2 Qg2 40. Kg2 Rh8 41. Qg3 Kf6 42. Rf1 Ke7 43. Qa3 Ndc5 44. Rc1 Kd6 45. b4 ab4 46. Qb4 Rab8 47. Qc4 Ke7

The 2019 GRENKE Chess Classic is a 10-player round-robin held in Germany from 22-29 April. The first 3 rounds are in Karlsruhe alongside the GRENKE Chess Open, then after two additional rounds in Karlsruhe and a rest day the last 4 rounds are in the Kulturhaus LA8 in Baden-Baden. The field features World Champion Magnus Carlsen and fellow Top 10 players Fabiano Caruana, Maxime Vachier-Lagrave, Vishy Anand and Levon Aronian.

The time control is 100 minutes for 40 moves, then 50 minutes for 20 moves and then 15 minutes to the end of the game, with a 30-second increment from move 1. If players are tied for first place a rapid play-off will take place. Official website: www.grenkechessclassic.com

To those of you who read the description: You are an excellent subscriber! :)
